website_summaries.verdict: The Marshall Monitor II ANC headphones deliver a solid audio experience and decent noise cancellation, but are priced a bit too high.
pros: Rich bass depth and crisp highs
Adjustable EQ and ANC in app
cons: No AptX or AAC codec support

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have Bose & Beats yet this is my fav pair. The sound is amazing, they are slim (when wearing them they don’t stick out on sides) and battery lasts for ages. Also, the button on the side is so simple to use, it’s ridiculous. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sibz

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly bad and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: So after less then 3 months these no longer charge or respond in anyway to being plugged in! They have not been damaged in any way or showed any sign of internal electrical issues apart from charging... I have no option of returning them or getting a replacement... Incredibly upset as my old Marshal headphones which are still going strong are over 6yrs old now and I’ve never had any issue with them! I just decided to invest in a wireless pair which are rubbish, plus paid over £150 for the pleasure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the quality of the these headphones and overall design ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the these headphones and overall design is great! I used Marshall Monitor wired headphones before and it had much more bass. I expected some more bass from Bluetooth version. And I liked F.T.F. in the previous version. Anyway this is very good product and it is much more comfortable to used it wirelessly. I am using these mainly in the office because I have a lot of annoying colleagues :)) and these headphones doing there job perfectly. Because of less bass and no F.T.F. comparing with previous Monitor version I am giving 4 stars out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy As on Photo Referance these are FAKE
customer_reviews.text: As the photos show on amazon Fake or Real Well I received a pair what matched the FAKE Photos
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: The booklet is wrong!
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is my second pair as I believed the first pair to be faulty. The included instruction booklet doesn’t tell you how to connect to the Bluetooth source accurately. It says hold the button for 5 seconds and then it will be visible on the Bluetooth device. This is wrong. You have to hold the button in until the light goes a deep blue colour, not white. This takes about 20 seconds of holding the button! I had to go through to the support on the Marshall site but they were great and even commented that the booklet needs updating!! Great headphones. Sound is brilliant. Buy them
customer_reviews.author: Ross Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Headache within first few hours of use.
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying wireless headsets for a while now and within hours of using these, I've started having a bad headache and my ears were hurting. Other reviews mentioned. tight fit, but given that I have a tiny head, I thought that this would be good for me (especially since other headphones are usually too big for me). But boy are they tight! The design does look great and they seem to be made really well. No complaints on sound either.
customer_reviews.author: Britttsle

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Christmas for my partner, however often use them myself. The sound, as with other Marshall products we own is fantastic. Battery life is extremely good and they appear to last forever between charges. Unlike other headphones we have these are over ear (depending obviously on your ear size), therefore are extremely comfortable to wear for long periods of time. Simple to use and are controlled form your iPod/phone/iPad etc, and found them easy to pair. I would highly recommend the headphones to others, and when comparing them to more expensive brands the sound quality is in no way compromised by the cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: T Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I didn't bother to check, when I bought them year and a half ago..
customer_reviews.text: I didn't bother to check, when I bought them year and a half ago, but I got a fakes sold and supplied by amazon. I didn't use it that much, because they feel unconformable on my ears. But still it feels crap shelling out over £100 for fakes sold and supplied by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: sides

customer_reviews.title: Fake replica!
customer_reviews.text: Hi my headphone's bluetooth function stopped working after a year. When enquiring with Marshall directly I was informed these are not genuine Marshall Headphones, but a fake replica. Therefore and unfortunately they were unable to proceed with a warranty claim. Really frustrating and should have been stated that these are not 100% legit. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Prakash Chauhan

customer_reviews.title: They're good.
customer_reviews.text: It's good. Battery lasts ages. Sounds quality is impressive; loud and doesn't break when turned up. Comfort is good, although not great with glasses like most over ear headphones. They can get a bit sweaty when it's hot out if you're walking with them. Build quality is good and sturdy. Bluetooth signal is strong with good range. Controlling the audio from the headphones is convenient and saves time having to get to your device.
customer_reviews.author: E. W. J. Tuppen

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular battery life & great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for over a month, used them every day on my commute and during the day. I have charged them once. This floored me, in this world of daily phone charging. One minor niggle: The instructions for the initial set-up were less than fantastic - their "hold for 3 seconds" is closer to five. A small problem, but it worried me on initial set up.
customer_reviews.author: EBR

customer_reviews.title: good sounding headphones, value for money
customer_reviews.text: first Impression is good. I listened different kinds of music, Duke Ellington Swing Jazz, Level 42 Funk, Earth Wind and Fire and Marillion. For my need, listening while travelling, they are more than good enough. So far a stable bluetooth connection. Can recommend them, but know that listening music is very subjective. When say it has a nice deep bass my son would say the bass is not deep enough. Difference in taste.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Versigny

customer_reviews.title: Loud!!!
customer_reviews.text: I listen to metal and the clarity is beautiful. It's not noise cancelling, I travel on london underground everyday and you can still hear the train but not the people. Really comfy on the head and ears, and it cranks everything up to 11! I do get disconections in the stations and when there's interference which can get annoying. Battery lasts about a month for a 2hr commute a day
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Gave them to my Grandsons for their Christmas (ages 8 and 6). They love them, so much more comfortable than the kids ones they had been using and we set up the volume control on their iPads so they don’t have them playing to loud! Took them a couple of days to remember that they didn’t need to walk around carrying their iPads and are enjoying dancing to their music
customer_reviews.author: pollycat

customer_reviews.title: Fake product received - buy direct from Marshall
customer_reviews.text: I received a fake product from a seemingly reputable third party seller (not necessarily their fault so won't name them!). Shame it took me 2 years of ownership to actually check them! Headphones were fairly uncomfortable and although the sound was decent it wasn't what I had expected from Marshall, which is no surprise given Marshall didn't make them. They did have a great battery life though!
customer_reviews.author: A.K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing compared to wired equivalent
customer_reviews.text: Drivers not as powerful as the wired version and sound is tinny, quiet, and lacks clarity Good for phone calls and battery life but I really bought them for music so a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Cabron

customer_reviews.title: Robust, good  build quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I have the wired Marshall headphones so upgraded to hassle free wireless sound. Lovely headphones. Good sound quality from audio books, jazz, reggae etc.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Okay, just not great
customer_reviews.text: When they work they’re great but they quite often cut out completely. No sound for a few seconds. Very frustrating and never had this issue with the cheap headphones purchased these to replace. Otherwise comfy to wear and sound quality is not a bassy as I’d expect but is adequate. They look great and the charge lasts an age considering I use them an awful lot. Overall they get a pass mark but no merit badges for excellence.
customer_reviews.author: A. Griffen

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I checked the packaging and found obvious indications thta this was a fake pair of headphones. Do your research and check for this issue with Marshall Headphones as therea re some very convincing fakes about.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Really nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Just excellent. Comfortable, stylish and sound excellent. The ability to connect them with a cable is nice too. Bluetooth connecting is always fast and never drops out. Absolutely nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of Marshall Monitors. I got a new iPhone 8 + and I decided to get some Bluetooth headphones. The price is perfect, the sound is great and the battery last for like 30 hours. Great sound!
customer_reviews.author: AstralD

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones good quality sound and beautiful design.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones I have tried others but this is the best for me. Very Good sound and amazing design. I'm very happy with the Marshall monitor Bluetooth. It is Bluetooth but can work also with jack
customer_reviews.author: DAMIANO PLATINETTI

customer_reviews.title: A high quality set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for some Bluetooth headphones and who better than the legendary Marshall. Sound quality is exceptional. Particularly for rock music but all genres appear to play with extreme clarity. It would be 5 stars but I experienced slight discomfort on left ear after prolonged use...but that could just be my ear :). Build quality is great and they capture the spirit of the iconic Marshall design.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Professional headset
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones with good sound quality, and extended battery life
customer_reviews.author: ChristopherK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, slight uncomfort after a few hours
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, the connectivity is fast and easy, aesthetically they look amazing, feel very good quality. Only issue would be that my ears start to hurt slightly after a few hours
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Superb! Marshall at its best.
customer_reviews.text: I have tested lots of headphones in my time, these Marshall’s are by far the best. Cool looking, comfortable and sound exceptional. Highly recommended, just buy them you will not regret it. Bought direct from Amazon as there are a few third party sellers selling fakes, spend the extra and get the real thing, excellent headphones!
customer_reviews.author: H. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: So tight!A bit electric noise
customer_reviews.text: This Headphone is so tight,makes it uncomfortable for long time use. The sound is a bit later than reality,makes it unsuitable for online chating.
customer_reviews.author: JackyZhang

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Hi - i have a older pair and they are very, very good - but the new bluetooth are very weak in the volume department - i am sending them back and would like a cash refund - do not buy them - Paul
customer_reviews.author: paul thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality and excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality and excellent sound. I tried some other more well known headphone brands, with and without noise cancelling, more expensive models as well, I prefer the sound of these and am very happy with the purchase. Battery life very good, controls a bit fiddly but once you get used to the toggle switch it easy to change tracks and volume on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Solid value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money, good sound and user controls. Not the top of the range but good comfort and difficult to get more for this price. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Cesso

customer_reviews.title: Marshall Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected from Marshall, nothing less, I only wish they were covered in lether instead of vynil, which doesn't make the headphones feel cheap or of low quality in any way, but that's something I would personally love to see them doing.
customer_reviews.author: Henea Denis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear. Looks fashionable. Has good noise cancellation but some traffic noise comes through. I the volume is not too loud and I would prefer a bit more bass. Overall I like the product and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Peter C.

customer_reviews.title: Great design, fantastic sound, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had Marshall speaker before, was very happy with it. Now bought this headset this also a great product use it for music, calls, gaming. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Slava

customer_reviews.title: Can't fault the sound. My only fault is they ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault the sound. My only fault is they are a wee bit small around the ear, and I consider myself to have small ears for my age!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesn’t connect
customer_reviews.text: Looked like a good quality headphone but Bluetooth didn’t connect with my Apple or wife’s android Phones.ordered another set and the same thing so have given up and will get another brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life, great sound. But the Bluetooth connection breaks sometimes
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, sounds great and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and comfortable. Very good sound despite the Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is amazing!!! But Bluetooth connection is not the best. And you can hear bluetooth sound. I was a little disappointed on the beginning. In general the are good headphones 🎧
customer_reviews.author: Mamargarett

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound..wish they were a tad louder. Built quality is solid even after 1y of use..yeah can't really fault them
customer_reviews.author: Marius Catalin Manolache

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. Great quality product from Marshall as expected, with excellent sound quality and long battery life. Can get slighty uncomfortable after a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Natural noise cancellation, excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Previously had the wired version. Same great quality, same great design, just upgraded to bluetooth!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great sound best headphones I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to cut out noise close by. They do a great job. The surround sound us amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: supersonic
customer_reviews.text: a little bit tight, but super quality (mine is original)
customer_reviews.author: Geza

customer_reviews.title: Great one!
customer_reviews.text: Okay this was quite a surprise for the price I've paid. Outstanding sound with great noise cancelling. The headphones are quite comfortable and the sound quality is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all activities.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of headphones, great for going on walks, chilling out at home and working out.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for music lovers
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation is good, but these headphones are fantastic for listening to music - fantastic sound definition - really enjoyable
customer_reviews.author: mike p

customer_reviews.title: Voice not working properly in calls
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t send my voice very well when I receive calls. I sent it back 40 days ago but i did have been not refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Sandro Saez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have learned a lot about the product from different reviews, and when I finally got my Marshall Mid I was very satisfied, as it is exactly as I expected. Sounds cool!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: There are fake
customer_reviews.text: These I believe are fake Marshall Headphones because the metal rubbed off pretty fast and the wedges are getting loose after only amount. Dont recommend
customer_reviews.author: Powerman123

customer_reviews.title: Clear as a bell
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a sound engineer he thinks they are very good.
customer_reviews.author: steve hallas

customer_reviews.title: Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Defective product. Returned. Amazon customer service on this occasion wasn't the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: A really decent product. Love wearing them. Sound is quality. Battery life is phenominal.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Feasey

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones,couldn’t ask for better quality and in fashion too.Very strong and durable👌🏻😉
customer_reviews.author: IEVA

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good, but noise cancellation is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased April 2018. They now lose connection and lots of buffering of songs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr N

customer_reviews.title: First ANC from Marshall.
customer_reviews.text: Design is good. Sound all neutral. App was not working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Gabriel Bonafe II

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: One of my best headphone ever. Long battery life. Comfortable. Great sound. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Good Bluetooth function. Sorry it feels a little bit tight on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy to work with. No issues with connectivity at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Gumier Motta

customer_reviews.title: It's alright but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good when it plays but it plays like a scratched CD most of the time
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Oneill

customer_reviews.title: perfect size to used for every day use and perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Crazy head phone I ever uses,perfect size to used for every day use and perfect sound .
customer_reviews.author: issa

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I bought them over the Bose or Sony equivalents
customer_reviews.text: These might not have active noise cancelling but the sound that comes through the Marshall Monitors is absolute gold. Timeless design with modern tech. The brass control button is so simple it's ridiculous; bass is pronounced yet undistorted; the battery lasts an age; and not least of all they just look classy. Some have said they are a tight fit but it's not worth any concern as they loosen up with use. Quality construction, quality sound. Very glad I bought them over the Bose or Sony equivalents.
customer_reviews.author: kookie888

customer_reviews.title: All in all good for the price. What i don t like are the wires. Too exposed for my taste.
customer_reviews.text: Not very loud. Good sound quality good bass, good design, nice leather. After pairing, right side has a noise like a morse code.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel von Lucian

customer_reviews.title: The headphones are extremely comfortable. sound really clean and battery life is awesome
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are extremely comfortable. sound really clean and battery life is awesome, did several days with one charge. Comes with box and cable that can make them run even if without battery. Coming from some marshall major II i can feel the difference in the sound. Great price and great item!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but i received a faulty piece.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak

customer_reviews.title: If you want to stand out
customer_reviews.text: For me it is like Marshall products screams Rock anywhere, so if you want to make a statement this is for you. I had Sony's before and even though the quality was great , these Marshalls doesn't have anything to envy, at least for me the personality is game point for the Marshalls
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos González C.

customer_reviews.title: Dont be fooled by the Marshall name!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting quality sound and slightly higher volume from the Marshall brand product. I am disappointed in product overall considering the price was high. The headphones fit loose and fall off easily along with an annoying static sound in the right speaker when the noise cancel option is activated. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Sheldone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Noise Canceling Headphone!
customer_reviews.text: I have Bose Noise canceling Headphone and I thought it was really good. BUT, after trying Marshall Monitor II, I changed my mind. This Headphone is 10 times better than the Bose I have! It becomes naturally quiet and you don't even notice you don't hear the noise around you. Especially annoying high pitch sounds. And you can answer the call. The sound quality is great. Nice natural sound. I was totally amazed, and made my family try on. They are all amazed. I don't think I can go back to Bose after this one.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality and design, SUPERIOR performance!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for both entertainment and studio/voiceover work and they are amazing. They deliver rich, lush sound and clarity through all genres of music. They fit very comfortably and the battery life is phenomenal too - I can take these out with me for hours and barely lose a "bar". The ANC works very well as I can use these on a city street and still be immersed in sound with no distraction. These are truly high-end studio headphones but without the staggering price of most. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: NaughtiLiterati

customer_reviews.title: calming isolation
customer_reviews.text: With this Marshall Monitor II Headphone, I can put myself out of the real and sometimes very noisy world. The noise cancellation is perfect as well as sound quality. The mobile application is clear, easy to navigate with a stable, uninterrupted Bluetooth connection. I have a big head but I don't feel any discomfort after hours of listening to music or podcasts. I feel a little tense when I wearing it just around my neck, so I put it in my pocket instead. Best mate for long trips and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Andras I Watzker

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are good headphones. Sound quality is very good, not exceptional. But I'm a musician and very picky. Battery life is long. Noise cancellation is okay but not the best I've heard. The controls are great. The main toggle is really nice, but sometimes it's hard to get the exact right direction. They are comfortable. But man are they expensive. There are other headphones that either sound better or have better noise canceling, or both, at a lower price point.
customer_reviews.author: Psychic Cypher

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and work great. They block out my husband's TV and he keeps it loud. All I hear is my music. These are on the expensive side but if you can get them it will be worth it. I've had less expensive headsets that I thought worked well until I used these for the first time. They are definitely worth the added money.
customer_reviews.author: ROXANNE

customer_reviews.title: Wow are these amazing cans!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a guitar player and uses Marshall equipment, so when I saw these headphones, I knew he had to have them. As one would expect, the sound quality is perfect. Comfortable, durable, great quality. Absolutely great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful pair of headphones. I had to download an app on my phone, so I could properly sync my phone to this set. I don't know if I care for that, but the sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Whitcome

product_meta.title: Marshall Monitor II A.N.C. Headphone - Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:Monitor II ANCInspired by Marshall heritage, Monitor II A.N.C. headphones are authentic yet modern, delivering high performance sound like you’ve never heard before. Advanced active noise cancelling technology blocks out the noise, letting you focus on what matters most – the music. Featuring custom tuned 40 mm dynamic drivers, these headphones produce a superior signature sound only Marshall can deliver. Engineered for an all-day listening experience, they boast up to 30 hours of wireless playtime with active noise cancelling and up to 45 hours without, meaning you’ll never miss a beat. While the unique ergonomic construction means no matter how hard and heavy the music, they will rest lightly on your head for the perfect fit. Monitor II A.N.C. headphones are truly made for the long haul.
feature_bullets: Active Noise Cancelling - Blocks external noise for an immersive audio experience that lasts up to 30 hours with A.N.C and Bluetooth enabled. Note: Please ensure to press and hold the power button and continue to press this button to take the item into pairing mode
Quick Charge - Just 15 minutes charging time gives you up to 5 hours of wireless playtime, with a full charge taking just 2 hours
Premium Comfort - Super soft ear cushions and a plush headband ideally adapts to any head shape for maximum comfort
Voice Assistant - Get help-on-the-go from your Google Assistant without glancing at your phone
Ultra Portable - The collapsible design and travel kit makes these headphones the utmost travel companion

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
